title: Rebellion's dovvnfall. Justitia regis, pax est populorum, tutamen patriæ, immunitas plebis, temperies aeris, serenitas maris, terræ sæcunditas, solatium paupuram, cura laguorum, gaudium hominum, hariditas filiorum, et fibimet ipsi spes futura beatitudinis. Greg. Mor. 5.
author: Quarles, John, 1624-1665.
publisher: Printed by Edward Crowch [sic] dwelling on Snow-hill.,
